But, the Witch ran her claws up and down Zoey's feet anyways, sending Zoey into hysterics. After a minute she stopped and untied Zoey. Before Zoey could get her back for torturing her, the Witch nimbly flipped away, leaving a tired and exhausted Zoey to think about why the Witch was tickling her instead of killing her.
1231112.title: Choice 2

123112.content: When Zoey awoke, she was hanging on to a rope above a pit of spikes. Her hands began to sweat when she saw the same Witch approach her. The Witch held a long pole with a electric toothbrush on the end of it. The Witch turned the toothbrush on and touched it to Zoey's armpit. Zoey screamed with laughter and tryed not to let go of the rope. The Witch pushed harder into Zoey's armpit and she felt her grip slipping on the rope. Finally, after 3 minutes of this, Zoey's hand opened and she fell from the rope, dropping toward her doom.
123112.title: Choice 2

1231121.content: Zoey landed at the bottom of the pit. When she hit a spike, it crumpled beneath her. She then realized that the spikes were of foam. Zoey looked up to see the Witch laughing. Zoey yelled,"That wasn't funny! " The Witch chuckles, "Are you kidding me, that was hilarious! " "Not only did I get to tickle the crap out of you, but I also got to see the look on your face when you realized that those spikes were made from foam!" Zoey screams, "What the heck, I thought I was going to die!" The Witch giggles, "That was the point" before tossing a ladder down the pit and walking away. Zoey climed the ladder out of the pit thinking bad thoughts about the Witch.
1231121.title: Choice 1

12333.content: k, how about a Safe house were the Witch was waiting inside, were Zoey was heading to get away from all the rest of the infected, but she didn't know that a Witch was inside there and now the Witch have her all to herself,(besides inside the safe room she can lock it so no one else can get in Tag: )
12333.title: wich Other zones than this?

choices: use the last of your ammo and Kill the last infecteds and get in
safe the Ammo and doge the infected  by finding another way to get in
123331.content:
Zoey was the only one Alive as the infected kill all the other 3, Bill Louis and Franciss were kill and the only one left was her, alone, With 10,384 Infecteds who wants a piece of her, and to make it worse she was almost out of ammo,as Zoey runs through the varios hordes of Zombies on the street, Zoey soon see a sign that have Safehouse her only moment of relief when she finds only to see that there were some Dozen Zombies there blocking your way to the safe house ,

Zoey hide and tought of it for a bit
Zoey: Kay now Zoey, You only got 2 options here, either use my last of ammo on them to shoot my way in to the safe house or get another alternative route to get in
123331.title: Safe Room or Room of the Tikling Witch

1233311.content: You blast through the horde with ease, but as you make it to the safe room, a smoker jumps out and suprises you. He wraps you up with his tongue and drags you to a nearby table. He clears the ammo and health kits from the table as you struggle to escape his tongue. Your heart nearly stops when you see two hunters grab your legs and help lift you onto the table. Each hunter pins a leg down while the smoker releases his tongue and holds down your wrists. All you think about his how theyre going to kill you, but to your suprise, the witch slashes straight through your jacket and undershirt, exposing your bare tummy. The witch eyes her new prize and immediately dances her long nails along your tummy and sides. You giggle harder and harder with each stroke. The smoker sends his slippery tongue up and down your armpits which drives you nuts. There are many ways this situation can get worse.....
1233311.title: use the last of your ammo and Kill the last inf...

choices: they take you out for the whole horde to tickle
12333111.content: as your giggling as the witch tickles your tummy & sides and the smoker is tickling your armpits you feel the hunters remove your shoes & socks and your thinking "oh no not that, anything but that" but it happens the hunters begin to tickle your bare feet. your giggling escalates to roaring with laughter, and that just encourages them to tickle you more harder. Can this get any worse?
12333111.title: the hunters join the fray

123331111.content: The hunters then take out a pair of stocks which they place both of your bare feet in, all this time the witch is still tickling your tummy and sides while the smoker is tickling your armpits with his tongue, Meanwhile you were still screaming with laughter, the hunters begin licking your feet and toes, this was too much you begin howling with uncontrollable fits of laughter!, you could not believe how much their tongues and teeth tickled!, you begin to think that you may never get out of this, then.....
123331111.title: they place you in stocks

choices: The two Hunters come back for more.
1233311112.content:
Just as you are feeling that you may never escape their tickling, you hear a loud smash. You hear the smash getting louder and louder, becoming faster as well. The wall behind the Witch, Smoker, and Hunters starts to crumble as a Jockey tears its way into the room. The three infected monsters turn around quickly to see what was going on. The Jockey slams into the wall one last time, sending him charging into the room. It immediately grabs the Witch and smashes it's head against the floor, until dead. The two Hunkers run out of the room while this happens, but the Smoker still wants to tickle your underarms, so it stands its ground. The Jockey then starts moving towards the Smoker, grabs the table that you are laying on and smashes the Smoker into the ground.
You lay in epic shock that a Jockey of all infected would save you. As you start to get up the Jockey knocks you back onto the floor, your brief thought of "I'm saved" is now replaced with "Oh shit" in an instant. The Jockey's claws slowly and gently drag down your stomach, causing you to giggle. You realize in that moment, to stay would only be trading one evil for another. So you quickly kick the Jockey in the face, get to your feet and sprint out of the room. Now left running down the street wondering why the infected were tickling you, instead of killing you.
1233311112.title: Jockey.

123332.content:
Picky, huh?
Fine, how about the map from left 4 dead 2, The Perish?
123332.title: Left 4 Dead 2

12333221.content: Zoey walked carefully along the ledge of the hotel, listening for special infected just waiting to shove her off. As she walked, she tried not to think of how the others died. She had just her auto shotgun, two pistols, and her wits. She saw the next window which she could break to get back into the hotel. Suddenly, she had a feeling that she shouldn't try the window. Too late to turn back, though. As she was about to shoot the window, a wild Charger barreled out, knocking Zoey toward the edge. Zoey hated a lot of infected, but she hated Chargers more then most. Somehow, she managed to hang on to the ledge for dear life. Zoey could have sworn the Charger was smiling as he walked over, stroking her fingers, which were still gripping the ledge. "Oh God." Zoey thought. "I'm going to die, I'm going to die." Then, something strange happened. The Charger grabbed her hand, almost as if he didn't want Zoey to fall off. Zoey was about to try wrestling her hand out of the Charger's, even if it meant death for her, when the Charger knocked her out.
12333221.title: The journey begins...

123332211.content: Zoey's eyes fluttered open. "Where am I?" She thought, looking around. Apparently, she was in one of the hotel's rooms. She lay spread eagle on the bed. When she tried to move, she saw that her arms and legs had been tied securely to the bed posts and a gag covered her mouth. "Since when did the infected know how to tie things?" Zoey thought to herself. The door to the room then opened, and in walked in a Witch. Zoey tugged against her bonds, knowing she was about to become the Witch's next meal. The Witch walked around Zoey slowly, eyeing her prey, then to the edge of the bed, next to her feet. She untied Zoey's sneakers, then pulled her shoes off slowly. "What is she doing now?!" Zoey thought in alarm. She then walked over and tugged the gag out of her mouth. Finally, she walked back down to Zoey's tied up left foot. She ran a nail over the socked sole, gently, briefly, lightly. Zoey was going to say a couple of rude things to the Witch, even if she didn't understand them, but when the Witch had touched Zoey's foot, Zoey couldn't help it. She let out a tiny giggle. Her feet were extremely ticklish, she hated it when people touched them. The Witch grinned, then began to wiggle one claw right in Zoey's arch. Zoey tried to hold the laughter back, instead struggling against the rope. Her restraints were too tight, however, and she finally allowed herself a giggle. "Hehehehehestopityouhehehehe!" The Witch then used two claws to tickle her, then three, then her whole hand, running her fingers up and down Zoey's sole. "Hehehehehenostopthathehehehehe!!" Then, the Witch stopped, but only to slowly pull Zoey's sock off. It took all of her willpower not to scream as she wiggled her bare toes. Then Witch then began tickling again, tickling with her claws right in Zoey's arch. "Hehehehehehestoppphehehehe!!" The Witch ran her fingers down to her heel, tickling there for a few seconds before tickling her way back up the sole, toward Zoey's toes. "Hahahahahathisistorturehahahastop!!!" When the Witch's nails finally reached Zoey's toes, she scrunched them up, then gave in to the Witch's tickling. "HAHAHAHAJUSTSTOPHAHANOTTHETOESHAHAHAHA!" The torture contiuned for fifteen more minutes, with the Witch running her claws all over Zoey's foot, her soles, her toes. She even ran a fingernail between her toes, causing her to burst into hysterics. She repeated the process on her right foot, then both at the same time. By the end of the fifteen minutes, tears were running down Zoey's red face. She cried," NOMOREHAHAHAHA!" The Witch finally stopped, grinning smugly at Zoey. Zoey was so tired, the Witch didn't even need to knock her out, she just passed out on the mattress.
123332211.title: The torture begins...

1233322111.content: When Zoey awoke again, she found herself surrounded by guns. She was in some kind of gun store, lying on a table. She was wrapped in layers of cling wrap tightly, from her ankles to her waist, exposing her feet. Her jacket had been removed, and her arms were wrapped above her head. Her feet were still bare, which she was not happy about. Her big toes had been tied together. "How's that for ironic?" Zoey thought. "All these weapons and I can't use one." As Zoey was thinking of ways to escape, the Witch that tickled her in the hotel walked down the staircase and into the room. Zoey looked up, recognizing that smug grin and those tickling nails on her soles. She began shaking in her restaints, twisting to get free. Of course, it was no use. The Witch walked down to Zoey's exposed feet, then ran a claw down her right sole. Zoey stifled a giggle, trying to pull her feet apart and then remembering that her toes had been tied. The Witch began gently spider tickling her right foot, using one hand to tickle, the other to hold Zoey still. "Hehehehehehehestopithehehe!" The Witch then began tickling both feet at once, her claws dancing up and down Zoey's soles. "Hehehehehehehehehenoohehe!" The Witch tickled her heels for a minute, then back up to her arch. "Hehehehehewhymehehehe!" After five minutes on her soles, she began tickling slowly up Zoey's foot, enjoying her laughter and pleas. "Hehehehehenotthetoeshehe!" Then, the Witch finally got to her toes, tickling the place where they connected to her foot, then tickling the toes themselves. "HEHEHEHESTOPITHENOTTHEREHEHEHE!" The Witch was very thorough, tickling her pads, the tops of her toes and feet, and between her toes. Then, after five more minutes of toe tickling, the Witch finally stopped. She looked down at Zoey, panting and out of breath. Then, she walked away from her feet, which caused Zoey to heave a sigh of relief. She walked back up the staircase. "Now what?" Thought Zoey. Then, the Witch came back, this time with two colorful peacock feathers. "Oh no." Zoey thought. "Not those." Then, instead of going back down to Zoey's struggling feet, she walked so that she was right behind her. Then, she ran both feathers though Zoey's underarms. Zoey yelped, trying to pull her arms down. The Witch smirked, then began wiggling the feathers in Zoey's armpits. "HEHEHEHEHENOOOSTOPSTOPSTOPHEHEHEHEHEHE!!" The Witch smiled, knowing she had found Zoey's weak spot. She continued the torture on poor Zoey's armpits. "HEHEHESTOPITHEHEHENOTTHEREHEHE!!" Then, the witch dropped the feathers all together and used her claws to tickle Zoey's underarms. "HEHEHEHEHESTOPILLDOANYTHINGHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!!!" After five more minutes, the Witch finally removed her claws from Zoey's underarms. Zoey once again was so tired, she fainted.
1233322111.title: Wrapped and ticklish

12333221111.content: Zoey's eyes fluttered open. She was getting tired of always passing out. She looked around. Zoey was in some kind of toy store in a mall, with her only restraints being a pair of handcuffs and the ropes that tied her feet together. The handcuffs were tied to another rope to ensure Zoey wouldn't be able to pull down her arms. The windows of the store were still intact, which Zoey thought was odd. Just as she was musing over it, the Witch that had been tickling her stepped out from behind a shelf. She wiggled her claws as she got closer, teasing Zoey. Zoey stifled the urge to twist in her restraints, she knew that they were tight enough to hold her. The Witch stepped behind her, then carefully wrapped her nails around Zoey's sides, so only her fingers were actually touching her. She didn't seem bent on harming Zoey physically, which explained why she didn't impale Zoey. The Witch squeezed gently, and Zoey yelped. The Witch grinned tauntingly, then began tickling Zoey's sides. Zoey tried to hold back the laughter, but failed. "Hehehehestopthathehe!" The Witch tickled harder, massaging Zoey's sides. "Hehehehehehnocutitouthehehe!" After two good minutes, the Witch removed her hands from Zoey's ribcage. Letting Zoey pant, she walked back behind the shelf. "What now?" Zoey thought. Then, the Witch came back with the same two feathers she had used to tickle Zoey's armpits. She quickly ran them over Zoey's stomach. She laughed, unable to help herself. The Witch began stroking the feathers up and down Zoey's tummy. She began laughing again. "Hehehehehenotthestomachhehe!" The Witch's eyes lit up, then she slyly slid the two feathers into Zoey's bellybutton. She wiggled them around, enjoying Zoey's laughter and struggling. "HEHEHENOHEHNOHEHENOOOOHEHE!" After two more minutes, the Witch dropped the feathers and gave Zoey a big raspberry. Zoey shrieked, it tickled so much. Then, the Witch danced her claws up and down Zoey's pale stomach. "Hehehehehestopheheithe!" She then wiggled a claw in her bellybutton. "GAHAHAHAHAHNOONOTTHEREHAOHMYGOSHITTICKLESHEHE!" The Witch continued to torture her bellybutton for six whole minutes. When she finally pulled her nail back, Zoey was drenched in sweat and red. She contiuned to pant even when the Witch walked right behind her. Then, the Witch put one of her claws in each of Zoey's palms. She slowly stroked them down her arms, all while Zoey begged and pleaded. The moment the claws entered her underarms, she yelped, then giggled. The Witch wiggled those two claws, doodling circles in Zoey's armpits. "HEHEHEHEICANTTAKEITHEHEHE!" The Witch proceeded to tickle Zoey with more of her fingers, adding one at a time. All poor Zoey could do is laugh as her underarms were tickled. "HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!!" Zoey thrashed in her restraints, knowing that the only thing that would stop the tickling was the Witch's mercy. "HEHEOHMYGOSHHEHEHEHEHE!!!" Finally, after an excruciating five minutes of armpit tickle torture, the Witch stopped. She watched Zoey, panting and gasping, with no expression on her face. Her eyes, glowing red as always, didn't change as she watched her breathe. "Don't pass out again." Zoey thought to herself. "It's what she wants, what she's waiting for." The Witch poked Zoey's pit again, causing her to yelp, but she didn't tickle her any more. Instead she just smiled, as if saying," So you're a resilient one, are you?" Then, she pulled a bottle out and sprayed Zoey with it. Zoey's head drooped, and her eyes closed.
12333221111.title: The Mall

choices: a smokr tickles her as the horde leaves
a hunter pins her and a witch strokes her feet in a ticklish manner
124.content: as she runs, she gets her feet stuck in the mud and has to remove her shoes. she frantically runs towards the visible safehouse and slams the door, only to find her socks are caught in the door. she procceeds to remove them and carries on running through the back door. She trips and sees a boomer approaching but only feels the warm slimy substance on her feet. she hears a roar as the horde run to her feet and lick her soles clean, top to bottom and between her toes. she roars with laughter as they continue.
124.title: Boomer (+ infected horde)

choices: The Smoker continues to tickle her navel.
The Smoker explores another area to tickle
The Smoker lets her go. (An Ending)
1242.content:
The Smoker deployed its tongue against Zoey, pinning her arms against the floor
and above her head, as the rest of the Horde moved on to find more survivors
and most likely tickle them. Zoey was trembling as the Smoker begun to slowly
unzip her jacket with scary precision. Once unzipped, the Smoker proceeded
to lift up her undershirt, while letting out an irritable high pitch scream.

The grip from the Smoker's tongue on Zoey's arms tightened as her smooth belly
became visible. Zoey was still trembling and was trying to free herself from the
Smoker and went into overdrive as the Smoker placed his disgusting, mutated,
left hand on her belly. The Smoker rubbed her belly, all though the friction between
felt unbearable, she was still giggling.

In her giggling fit, she was unable to see and prepare for what was coming.
The Smoker put his index finger into her belly button, and wiggled it around,
scraping its rotten nail against the bottom, and pushing it down. Zoey bursted
out into an uncontrollable laughing fit, squirming around and lifting her hips off
of the ground.

Zoey knew she had to break free of the Smoker, she knew that once he
had finished tickling her, he would kill her. But at the same time,
she was too powerless to try anything. It was all dependent on what the Smoker
was going to do.
1242.title: The Smoker Enjoys Life ...or Death.

choices: Be brave and give it another go
12421.content:
Despite all the squirming, Zoey couldn't get the Smoker's
finger out of her belly button, she was too ticklish there.
Zoey looked around the safe house to find something of
use against the Smoker, but was out of luck.

Tickling Zoey was taking all of the Smoker's attention,
his tongue's grip on her pinned arms loosened enough that
a weakened Zoey could use what little strength she had and
overpower him. She drove her palm into his chest and
rolled him off of her.

Her belly button was throbbing as she got onto her feet
and tried running away, but was incredibly off-balanced.
The Smoker extended his tongue and wrapped it around
Zoey's torso, just below her breasts. Zoey looked down
just in-time to see the tip of the tongue approaching her
already tender navel.

Once again, Zoey was laughing uncontrollably, the
Smoker was licking her belly button, running the tip
around the rim and occasionally entering it and licking
the tender bottom inside. Zoey tried to fight it off, but
the Smoker wasn't going to lose his grip again.

Squirming didn't help her, and eventually, her legs
began to weaken. The Smoker pulled her in, wrapping
his tongue around her arms above her head once again.
The Smoker danced his index finger around inside of
her belly button.

Zoey could sense the frustration of the Smoker by how
hard he was fingering her navel, she had a slight feeling
that next time he'd be tickling a corpse. She was running
very low on options, and needed something quick.
12421.title: "Your Belly Button Is Mine!"

info.brief_description: Zoey ends up in a few "Ticklish" situations
info.description:
Set in the first Left 4 dead, this story features the only girl in the survivors, Zoey, ending up in situations where she's tickled silly, by human or infected, I don't know.

and as usual, we have the usual guidelines.
No nudity
No sex stuff
No killing

So, with that out of the way, let the fun begin
